title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Maritime Area Consent (Certain
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Maritime Area Consent (Certain 

Application Fees) (No. 2) Regulations 2023. 

Definition
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited maritime area consent (certain application fees) (no 2) regulation 2023 definition

2. 

In these Regulations “Act” means Maritime Area Planning Act 2021

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 3. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 77(1) of
text_raw:
3. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 77(1) of 

the Act for a declaration by the MARA is €1,000. 

Fee for MAC grant application
text_norm: 3 fee specified accompany application section 77(1) act declaration mara eur1 000 fee mac grant application

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 4. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 79(1) of
text_raw:
4. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 79(1) of 

the Act for the grant of MAC for projects with a projected total cost of — 

(a) 

(b) 

€10,000,000, or less, is a fee of €1,000, 

 more than €10,000,000 but less than €100,000,000, is a fee of 
€10,000, and 

(c) 

 €100,000,000 or more, is a fee of €25,000. 

No fee for application for non-material amendment to MAC
text_norm: 4 fee specified accompany application section 79(1) act grant mac project projected total cost -- (a) (b) eur10 000 000 le fee eur1 000 eur10 000 000 le eur100 000 000 fee eur10 000 (c) eur100 000 000 fee eur25 000 fee application non-material amendment mac

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 5. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 86(5) of
text_raw:
5. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 86(5) of 
the Act by the holder of a MAC who wishes to make an amendment to the 
MAC which it considers to be a non-material amendment is zero. 

No fee for application for surrender of MAC
text_norm: 5 fee specified accompany application section 86(5) act holder mac wish make amendment mac considers non-material amendment zero fee application surrender mac

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 6. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 88 of the
text_raw:
6. The fee specified to accompany an application under section 88 of the 

Act by the holder of a MAC for the surrender of the MAC is zero. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [508] 3 

Waiver of fee
text_norm: 6 fee specified accompany application section 88 act holder mac surrender mac zero notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 27th october 2023 508 3 waiver fee

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 7. The MARA may waive a fee under these Regulations where the
text_raw:
7. The MARA may waive a fee under these Regulations where the 
applicant is a non-profit entity being a legal person organised for a collective, 
public or social benefit and does not operate as a business whose aim is to 
generate a profit for its owners. 

Revocation
text_norm: 7 mara may waive fee regulation applicant non-profit entity legal person organised collective public social benefit operate business whose aim generate profit owner revocation

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: 8. The Maritime Area Consent (Certain Application Fees) Regulations
text_raw:
8. The Maritime Area Consent (Certain Application Fees) Regulations 

2023 (S. I. No. 403 of 2023) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 October, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [508]
text_norm: 8 maritime area consent (certain application fees) regulation 2023 (s i no 403 2023) revoked given official seal 24 october 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage 4 508

title: Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021), after consultation with the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for fees in respect of fees to accompany certain 
applications in relation to maritime area consent for the occupation of part of 
the maritime area of the State. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [508] 5
